raw_body:
DE SILVA – CHINTHAN. The death is announced of Chinthan de Silva,​ son of Rev. Shelton and Mrs. Kamala de Silva (nee Philips),​ brother of Dr. Santhusht de Silva,​ Mr. Renuk (Ray) de Silva,​ and Dr. Jani Ravina de Silva,​ brother-in-law of Katherine de Silva and Gloria de Silva. Studied at Trinity College Kandy and S. Thomas’ College Mt. Lavinia,​ member of the YMCA Y’s Men’s Club. Funeral at Kohuwela Cemetery on 25th January (poya day) at 5.00 p.m. No flowers by request.
005245
